text: On ciro, ki dar xonahojaton az ojoti Alloh (Qur'on) va hikmat (hadishoi rasuli Alloh) tilovat mesavad, jod kuned va ʙa sunnatas amal kuned va ehtiromasro ʙa co ored, ki ne'mati Alloh ast, ʙa sumo arzoni sudaast. Haroina, Alloh daqiqu nozukʙin ast, ki sumoro dar xonahoe qaror dodaast dar on ojoti Alloh va sunnati Rasulas xonda mesavad va ogoh ast, ki sumoro az zumrai hamsaroni rasulas ixtijor kardaast
